item.title: BMY
item.description: score:-38 Chances: Bristol-Myers Squibb Company (BMY) is a pharmaceutical company known for developing lifesaving drugs. The company’s drug repotrectinib has shown durable efficacy benefits in treating patients with specific types of lung cancer. Bristol Myers Squibb’s strong second-quarter earnings beat and revenue beat ratios for the healthcare sector are impressive.
